articles.description: Crypto and blockchain startups in the country have seen unprecedented investor capital inflow from international ventures amid a booming developer ecosystem, rising awareness and interest amongst retail investors to invest in tokens and cryptocurrencies, and …
articles.content: India attracted crypto funding and blockchain investments worth $638 million across 48 rounds in 2021, according to data by industry tracker Tracxn that was shared with ET. Globally, funding for cryp… [+2138 chars]
